title: Attempt 1, 2, 3
body:
Hey guys, this is an old issue...
I´ve fixed it several times on my PC, this problem comes up every couple of months, and sometimes it just fixes on its own, but now I literally don´t know what to do, I've tried every single video in youtube (changing DNS, time sync, reset IE config) 
Is there anything else I can do? Wanna play LoL, help me fellow summoners!

replies.body:
>Hey guys, this is an old issue...
I´ve fixed it several times on my PC, this problem comes up every couple of months, and sometimes it just fixes on its own, but now I literally don´t know what to do, I've tried every single video in youtube (changing DNS, time sync, reset IE config)
Is there anything else I can do? Wanna play LoL, help me fellow summoners!

What exactly is your issue? You didn't say what was happening, lol.
